FuncDef: The reset dns application cache command clears the cache of the application domain name resolution. The reset dns application cache command clears the cache of the application domain name resolution.

ParaDef.Info:
Clear the cache of the application domain name resolution of the specific domain name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: Run this command if you need to clear the cache of the application domain name resolution.
